test_desc: Ensure that a unique Certificate Authority is used for etcd (Not Scored)
Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required (Not Scored)
Create administrative boundaries between resources using namespaces (Not Scored)
Create network segmentation using Network Policies (Not Scored)
Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default in your pod definitions (Not Scored)
Apply Security Context to Your Pods and Containers (Not Scored)
Configure Image Provenance using ImagePolicyWebhook admission controller (Not Scored)
Configure Network policies as appropriate (Not Scored)
Place compensating controls in the form of PSP and RBAC for privileged containers usage (Not Scored)
Do not admit privileged containers (Not Scored)
Do not admit containers wishing to share the host process ID namespace (Scored)
Do not admit containers wishing to share the host IPC namespace (Scored)
Do not admit containers wishing to share the host network namespace (Scored)
Do not admit containers with allowPrivilegeEscalation (Scored)
Do not admit root containers (Not Scored)
Do not admit containers with dangerous capabilities (Not Scored)
